name: Rapid
description: Fast paced top down shooter. The game is inspired by retro arcade games and some more modern takes on the genre.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1000m Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 1000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Any Realtek sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel i3 3110m Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 730 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any Realtek sound card
